IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE MEMBERS, TO PROMOTE AND MAINTAIN HIGH PROFESSIONAL STANDARDS, TO ADVOCATE AND PROTECT THE INTERESTS, AND TO SERVE THE NEEDS OF THE GEORGIA SOCIETY OF CPA'S.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE MEMBERS, TO PROMOTE AND MAINTAIN HIGH PROFESSIONAL STANDARDS, TO ADVOCATE AND PROTECT THE INTERESTS, AND TO SERVE THE NEEDS OF THE GEORGIA SOCIETY OF CPA'S.
IRS990.Desc: CHAPTER MEETINGS AND OTHER CHAPTER EXPENSES:17 CHAPTERS CONDUCT MONTHLY MEETINGS AND CONTINUING EDUCATION PROGRAMS THROUGHOUT THE STATE OF GEORGIA.

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.GrantTypeTxt: SCHOLARSHIPS AWARDED TO STUDENTS BY THE LOCAL CHAPTERS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH CHAPTER OF THE ORGANIZATION ONLY GRANTS SCHOLARSHIPS TO INDIVIDUALS ATTENDING ACCREDITED HIGHER LEARNING INSTITUTIONS IN THE UNITED STATES. THE SCHOLARSHIP COMMITTEES REVIEW EACH RECIPIENT TO ENSURE THE INDIVIDUAL MEETS THE SPECIFIED PROGRAM REQUIREMENTS OF THE ORGANIZATION. THE INDIVIDUAL MUST SUPPLY A COPY OF THE CURRENT TRANSCRIPT TO VERIFY ENROLLMENT IN SAID INSTITUTION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE MEMBERS OF THE GEORGIA SOCIETY OF CERTIFIED PUBLIC ACCOUNTANTS CHAPTERS ELECT THE MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNING BODY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE DECISIONS OF THE GOVERNING BODY ARE SUBJECT TO APPROVAL BY THE MEMBERS OF THE GEORGIA SOCIETY OF CERTIFIED PUBLIC ACCOUNTANTS CHAPTERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS PREPARED BY AN OUTSIDE CPA FIRM, APRIO, LLP. THE CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD, THE TREASURER, AND SENIOR MANAGEMENT OF THE ORGANIZATION PERFORM A DETAILED REVIEW OF THE FORM 990 AND ATTACHMENTS. FORM 990 IS THEN MADE AVAILABLE ELECTRONICALLY TO THE REMAINDER OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR THEIR REVIEW PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE OFFICERS AND DIRECTORS OF THE ORGANIZATION ANNUALLY RECEIVE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY TO REVIEW AND SIGN. THE COPIES ARE MAINTAINED AND INTERNALLY REVIEWED BY THE GEORGIA SOCIETY OF CERTIFIED PUBLIC ACCOUNTANTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAINTAINS ITS FORM 990, GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND AUDITED FINANICAL STATEMENTS IN PERMANENT FILES WHICH ARE READILY AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
